title: How to Make Sugar Cookie Dough for Children

steps.headline: Add the butter and sugar to a mixing bowl and cream well.
Add the eggs and beat until fluffy.
Whisk together the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl.
Add the dry ingredients alternately with the milk.
steps.description: Add more flour, if the dough is sticky. The dough should remain soft but be easy to handle.

steps.headline: Roll cookie dough out ¼" (½ cm) thick on a well-floured pastry cloth.
Bake the cookies for 8 minutes on ungreased cookie sheets.
Frost and decorate the cookies as desired.

text: Preheat oven to 350-375℉ (175-190℃).  Add the butter and sugar to a mixing bowl and cream well.  Add the eggs and beat until fluffy.  Whisk together the dry ingredients in a large mixing bowl.  Add the dry ingredients alternately with the milk. Add more flour, if the dough is sticky. The dough should remain soft but be easy to handle. Roll cookie dough out ¼" (½ cm) thick on a well-floured pastry cloth.  Bake the cookies for 8 minutes on ungreased cookie sheets.  Frost and decorate the cookies as desired.
